description:
The docs migration from the openstack-manuals repo to the nova repo is missing the detailed hypervisor-specific configuration references, e.g.:

https://github.com/openstack/openstack-manuals/blob/stable/ocata/doc/config-reference/source/compute/hypervisor-hyper-v.rst

Those are important since (1) they are detailed for the given hypervisor (the vmware one is also very detailed) and (2) there are other docs referencing them, like some Cinder Windows docs reference the hyper-v compute config reference doc.
title: docs migration is missing hypervisor-specific configuration references
